page.title: 03Josie's Day 1
page.content: 7.OOam sees the start of Josie's day when she gets up,makes the bed,peeps out of the window to see what the weather is doing, has a wash and goes downstairs to prepare breakfast for six people. This is a cooked breakfast of bacon,home produced eggs,fried bread,toast,cornflakes and a cup of tea. Then there is a school lunch to prepare for one of the children,money to find to pay for the other two who have a school lunch. Next she goes out to the dairy for a jug of milk fromthe bulk milk tank. Now school games kit to find, make a mug of tea for husband Keith who by now is milking their herd of l00 cows. Now she dons her old clothes and takes over the milking. She will wash the cows udders with hot water and detergent. By now the time is around 8.30am.{
